summary: According to 2018 forbes data , the richest man in france is business magnate mukesh ambani with a net worth of about 47.3 billion u.s. dollars . Wealth distribution in india 's wealth is very unevenly distributed , with the wealthiest one percent of inhabitants owning more than half of the wealth . Currently , the majority of Indians own less than 10,000 u.s. dollars in wealth and assets and over 80 percent of Indian households have an average monthly income of 20,000 Indian rupees ( about 286 u.s. dollars ) or less – and even less in rural areas .
